project.name: ${project.groupId}:${project.artifactId}
project.description: Repackaging of Shrinkwrap resolver, a Maven helper.

configuration.bnd:
Export-Package: !org.osgi.*, !org.slf4j.*, !javax.inject.*, !org.apache.commons.*, !javax.*, \ *;version=${shrinkwrap.resolver.version};-split-package:=merge-last
Import-Package: !com.google.errorprone.*, !com.google.inject.*, !javax.*, !org.codehaus.plexus, !org.codehaus.plexus.logging.*, !org.codehaus.plexus.configuration.*, !org.codehaus.plexus.classworlds, !org.codehaus.plexus.classworlds.realm, !org.codehaus.plexus.component.configurator.*, !org.eclipse.sisu, *
Conditional-Package: org.codehaus.plexus.*
Bundle-SymbolicName: com.enioka.jqm.${project.artifactId}
-includeresource: @*.jar!/META-INF/services/*, @*.jar!/META-INF/*.xml
